Class OCRFactoryClass

public class OCRFactoryClass
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines methods for performing ocr operation on files.

    • Method Detail

      • createOCRForFile

        public void createOCRForFile(java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier,
                    java.lang.String inputFolderLocation,
                    java.lang.String imageFileName,
                    java.lang.String outputFolderLocation)
                      throws DCMAException,
                             DCMAApplicationException
        Creates the hocr for a file using the plugin selected for ocr'ing in the batch class.
        Parameters:
        batchClassIdentifier - the batch class identifier.
        inputFolderLocation - folder containing the images
        imageFileName - image file to be used for ocr'ing
        outputFolderLocation - folder where hocr will be generated
        Throws:
        DCMAException - if an error occurs while creating the hocr file
        DCMAApplicationException - if an error occurs while creating the hocr file

      • generateHOCRFilesForFolder

        public void generateHOCRFilesForFolder(java.lang.String folderPath,
                              java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier)
                                throws DCMAApplicationException,
                                       java.io.IOException
        Generates hocr files for all the images present inside a folder.
        Parameters:
        folderPath - path of folder containing images
        batchClassIdentifier - batch class identifier
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException - if an error occurs while creating the hocr file
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while creating the hocr file
